faqItems.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqItems.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and bank transfers. All payments are processed securely through our encrypted payment gateway.

faqItems.question: How long does shipping take?
faqItems.answer: Standard shipping takes 3-5 business days within the continental US. Express shipping (1-2 business days) is available for an additional fee. International shipping times vary by location.

faqItems.question: Do you offer free shipping?
faqItems.answer: Yes! We offer free standard shipping on all orders over $50. Orders under $50 have a flat rate shipping fee of $9.99.

faqItems.question: What is your return policy?
faqItems.answer: We offer a 30-day return policy for all unused items in their original packaging. Return shipping is free for defective items. Please contact our customer service team to initiate a return.

faqItems.question: Do you ship internationally?
faqItems.answer: Yes, we ship to most countries worldwide. International shipping rates and delivery times vary by location. You can check shipping costs during checkout.

faqItems.question: Can I track my order?
faqItems.answer: Yes! Once your order ships, you'll receive a tracking number via email. You can also track your order status by logging into your account on our website.

faqItems.question: Do you offer assembly services?
faqItems.answer: We offer professional assembly services for an additional fee. Our trained technicians can assemble your furniture at your home or office. Contact us for pricing and availability.

faqItems.question: What warranty do you provide?
faqItems.answer: All our furniture comes with a minimum 1-year warranty covering manufacturing defects. Premium items may have extended warranties. Please check individual product pages for specific warranty details.
